name: You got an A
description:
WEEK 2 OF MY GAME A WEEK ASSIGNMENT!

You got an A is my second "Game a Week" game. The theme for this week's game was "Tactile" so I had to make something that communicated touch.

For me paper is one of the most recognizable feelings so I made a simple game where you stamp sheets of paper, that's it. Play the game at your own pace, fast or slow. This game is for people that want a simple experience where challenging yourself is optional.

Enjoy!
